name: Cash out and Carry
description:
Cash out and carry is my very first game, created without any help or tutorial. The game is about a thief, which has unlimited time to plan his escape until he opens a chest. Once the chest is opened, lights turn off and the one-minute timer starts.

I believe that into the future, this game has the potential to grow into more difficult levels, however, I was under time pressure.

How to control:
WASD/Arrows - movement
E - Open/Rob chest
F - Flashlight On/Off
R - Reset level
ESC - Menu/Quit
